ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class ColourCalibration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.ColourCalibration

  • public class ColourCalibration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for everything color-identification related. Makes use of the Gaussian distribution to identify the detected color.
    Author:
    Bryan Jay, Volen Mihaylov, Patrick Ghazal
